title: Update splash screen branding text to “Star Maharashtra Galaxy Internet”

requirements.summary: Replace the splash screen branding text with the exact company name “Star Maharashtra Galaxy Internet” while preserving skip, timing, fade-out, and reduced-motion behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On app load, the Splash Screen shows the text exactly "Star Maharashtra Galaxy Internet" (matching spelling and capitalization), and it is visible as the primary branding text.
The texts "SMGI" and "Network Solutions" are not displayed anywhere on the splash screen.
Clicking/tapping anywhere on the splash screen still skips it and transitions to the main app UI.
The splash screen still auto-transitions after the existing timeout and fades out before entering the main UI.
When the user has prefers-reduced-motion enabled, the splash screen uses the reduced-motion behavior and still transitions quickly (no blocking animation).
No backend changes are required or introduced for this update.

file_operations.description: Update the displayed branding text to exactly “Star Maharashtra Galaxy Internet”, removing any rendering of “SMGI” and “Network Solutions”, while preserving existing behaviors (auto-transition duration, fade-out timing, click/tap-to-skip, and prefers-reduced-motion handling). Keep all user-facing UI text in English. Continue using the existing shadcn-ui Button for the Skip control (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)
